mapper.insert: insert into obj_cat_item_rel (REL_ID, OBJ_TYPE, OBJ_ID, CATALOG_ITEM_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{relId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{objType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{catalogItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update obj_cat_item_rel set OBJ_TYPE = #{objType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_ID = #{objId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CATALOG_ITEM_ID = #{catalogItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}} where REL_ID = #{relId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select REL_ID, OBJ_TYPE, OBJ_ID, CATALOG_ITEM_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from obj_cat_item_rel where REL_ID = #{relId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select REL_ID, OBJ_TYPE, OBJ_ID, CATALOG_ITEM_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from obj_cat_item_rel

select REL_ID, OBJ_TYPE, OBJ_ID, CATALOG_ITEM_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from obj_cat_item_rel where OBJ_ID = #{objId} and OBJ_TYPE = 6000
